import React from "react"; import { MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBCardImage, MDBBtn, MDBRipple, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { addToCart, removeItem, addToWhishList } from "../features/cartSlice"; export default function App() { const items = useSelector((state) => state.allCart.items); const {cart, totalQuantity,totalPrice,saved,totalDiscount} =useSelector((state)=>state.allCart.items); const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( {items.map((item) => (
{item.title}{" "} {totalDiscount}% {" "} ${item.disrate} {" "} ${item.price}
{item.rating}
dispatch(addToCart(item))} > Add to cart {" "} ))} ); }
